item.title: The Constitution Vindicates Trump’s Firing Of 17 Inspectors General
item.description: Accountability requires the power to remove. Without it, the president cannot control who wields his own executive power and how.

item.title: New Video Shows CBS Deceptively Edited Kamala Harris Interview During 2024 Campaign
item.description: CBS let Harris get away with having only her most coherent moments air, while shielding the American people from her meandering responses.

item.title: Supreme Court Could Put An End To Public School Monopolies
item.description: The Supreme Court has a case before it that could strike another blow at 'state establishment' — not of monopoly in religion, but in America’s primary...

item.title: Pro-Natal Policies Fail Because People Don’t Want Kids
item.description: The ineffectiveness of pro-natal programs suggests raising the next generation isn’t a main priority of 21st-century adults.

item.title: Texas’ School Choice Bill Will Help Teachers And Students Alike
item.description: The status quo isn’t working, and reform is needed more now than ever.
